price: ߕߎ߬ߡߊ ߡߍ߲ ߛߏ߬ ߟߞߊ߬ߟߌ߲߬ ߢߌߡߊ ߟߎ߫ ߞߊ߬ ߓߙߊߓߐ ߞߍ߫ ߊ߬ ߦߋ߫ ߥߎ߬ߙߊ ߝߍ߬
arabic: إِذۡ عُرِضَ عَلَيۡهِ بِٱلۡعَشِيِّ ٱلصَّٰفِنَٰتُ ٱلۡجِيَادُ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: idh ʿuriḍa ʿalayhi bil-ʿashiyi al-ṣāfinātu al-jiyādu
